name: Swakker
overview:
Swakker lets you personalize your mobile messaging.

Now you can communicate in creative ways, like drawing in a chat and writing messages in the sky. Swakker is powerful, allowing you to text with all your friends, and it’s special, giving you the ability to create and share pictures and messages that no other service provides. 

It’s time to revolutionize your mobile messaging and go beyond plain texting. 

Features  • Write 3D messages in the sky and send them to friends on Swakker, Facebook, email, SMS and IM  • Draw in your chat in an ongoing stream on new and album photos  • See where your friends are on a live GPS map. Choose whether to share your location  • Text for free with any mobile  • Chat with friends and sync your status and availability across all IM services  • Swipe from chat to chat  • Combine your Swakker, Facebook, Address Book and IM friends into one buddy list  • Tap a song, artist, album or movie in your friend’s list of Faves to download in iTunes  • Decorate your friend’s Swakker Wall with stamps and doodles  • Receive an alert from Swakker Seatbelt when you may be texting and driving  • Receive an alert from Swakker Goggles when you text after midnight
